named-query.name: SitTF24Versamenti.getVersamentoByID
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Versamenti v where v.id = :id

named-query.name: SitTF24Annullamento.getAnnullamentoByID
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Annullamento v where v.id = :id

named-query.name: SitTF24Versamenti.getListaVersamentiByCF
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Versamenti v where v.cf =:codfisc

named-query.name: SitTF24Versamenti.getListaVersamentiByCFOrderByTipoAnno
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Versamenti v where v.cf =:codfisc order by v.tipoImposta, v.annoRif, v.dtRiscossione

named-query.name: SitTF24Annullamento.getListaByCF
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Annullamento v where v.cf =:codfisc

named-query.name: SitTF24Versamenti.getListaVersamentiByAnn
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Versamenti v where v.cf =:codfisc and v.dtRipartizione=:dtRipartizione and v.progRipartizione=:progRipartizione and v.annoRif=:annoRif and v.dtBonifico=:dtBonifico and v.dtRiscossione=:dtRiscossione and v.codEnteRd=:codEnte and v.codTributo=:codTributo

named-query.name: SitTF24Annullamento.getListaAnnullamentiByVer
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24Annullamento v where v.cf =:codfisc and v.dtRipartOrig=:dtRipartizione and v.progRipartOrig=:progRipartizione and v.annoRif=:annoRif and v.dtBonificoOrig=:dtBonifico and v.dtRiscossione=:dtRiscossione and v.codEnteRd=:codEnte and v.codTributo=:codTributo

named-query.name: SitTF24Versamenti.getMaxDtInsMod
named-query.query: select max(v.dtIns), max(v.dtMod) from SitTF24Versamenti v

named-query.name: SitTCodTributo.getDescTributoByCod
named-query.query: select v from SitTCodTributo v where v.codice = :codice

named-query.name: SitTF24CodSogg.getTipoSoggByCodice
named-query.query: select v from SitTF24CodSogg v where v.id.codice = :codice

named-query.name: SitTCodTributo.getLista
named-query.query: select ca from SitTCodTributo ca order by codice

named-query.name: SitTCodTributo.getListaDescrizioni
named-query.query: select distinct ca.descrizione from SitTCodTributo ca order by descrizione
